item.title: 法院暂缓禁令后，TikTok在加拿大获得缓刑
item.description: 此前要求TikTok在加拿大逐步停止运营的命令已被法官搁置，因此该平台目前仍可继续运营其在加拿大的子公司。【原文：TikTok will be able to continue operating its subsidiary in Canada for now, after a previous order for it to wind down its operations in the country was shelved by a judge.】

item.title: 人工智能初创企业SambaNova在与英特尔的谈判陷入僵局后，寻求最高5亿美元融资
item.description: 知情人士透露，人工智能初创企业SambaNova Systems Inc.正考虑筹集高达5亿美元的资金，此前该公司与英特尔公司（Intel Corp.）的收购谈判陷入停滞。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup SambaNova Systems Inc. is considering raising up to $500 million after talks to sell to Intel Corp. stalled, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德意志交易所达成62亿美元收购Allfunds协议
item.description: 德意志交易所集团同意以约53亿欧元（62亿美元）的现金和股票收购欧洲基金分销平台Allfunds集团。【原文：Deutsche Boerse AG agreed to acquire European fund distribution platform Allfunds Group Plc for about €5.3 billion ($6.2 billion) in cash and stock.】

item.title: 一场极不一致的通胀预测
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日的精彩内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是我们专家嘉宾和信息源网络的贡献。无论内容如何，我们保证始终引人入胜。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 中国副总理在达沃斯会见戴蒙、库克、达利欧等首席执行官
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国国务院副总理何立峰在达沃斯世界经济论坛期间会见了多位全球企业高管——在贸易和金融碎片化引发担忧之际，此举彰显了中国持续拓展国际合作的决心。【原文：China’s Vice Premier He Lifeng met with a coterie of top global executives at the World Economic Forum in Davos, according to a person familiar with the matter — maintaining his nation’s international outreach amid fears of trade and financial fragmentation.】

item.title: 苹果将重塑Siri为内置于iPhone和Mac的聊天机器人以抗衡OpenAI
item.description: 苹果公司计划在今年晚些时候对Siri进行全面升级，将其打造为公司首款人工智能聊天机器人，从而推动这家iPhone制造商加入由OpenAI和谷歌主导的生成式人工智能竞赛。【原文：Apple Inc. plans to revamp Siri later this year by turning the digital assistant into the company’s first artificial intelligence chatbot, thrusting the iPhone maker into a generative AI race dominated by OpenAI and Google.】

item.title: 60亿美元国债ETF成为代币化金融试验场
item.description: 华尔街受监管最严格的资产类别之一正被纳入数字金融的轨道。【原文：One of Wall Street’s most regulated asset classes is being pulled into the orbit of digital finance.】

item.title: Anthropic营收年化率突破90亿美元，风投机构争相注资
item.description:
Iconiq、Lightspeed和Menlo Ventures即将加入该初创企业的新一轮融资，估值达3500亿美元。

【原文：

Iconiq, Lightspeed and Menlo Ventures are set to join the startup’s new funding round at a $350 billion valuation. 

】

item.title: 阿根廷中期选举后经济萎缩幅度超预期
item.description: 阿根廷经济在11月连续第二个月萎缩，此前该国经历了一场关键的中期选举，导致市场出现急剧抛售。【原文：Argentina’s economy contracted for a second consecutive month in November on the heels of a crunch midterm election that had precipitated a sharp market selloff.】

item.title: 高盛晋升明尼斯，调任惠勒领导杠杆融资业务
item.description: 高盛集团正在对其全球信贷业务进行领导层调整，为资深合伙人克里斯蒂娜·米尼斯设立新职位。【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is making leadership changes across its global credit business, creating a new role for veteran partner Christina Minnis.】

item.title: 美联储资产负债表成焦点，特朗普考虑主席人选之际
item.description: 随着投资者等待特朗普总统提名下一任美联储主席人选，一个关键问题浮出水面——这位候选人将如何管理美联储6.6万亿美元的资产负债表。【原文：A key question is emerging as investors await President Donald Trump’s nominee as the next Federal Reserve chair — how the candidate will manage the central bank’s $6.6 trillion balance sheet.】

item.title: 私募股权公司首席执行官敦促欧洲将目光投向东方，因压力日益增大
item.description: 私募股权公司方源资本首席执行官唐永明表示，随着本土压力日益增大，欧洲企业应将目光投向亚洲以维持增长。【原文：European companies should look to Asia to sustain growth as pressures mount at home, according to Frank Tang, chief executive officer of private equity firm FountainVest Partners.】

item.title: 专家称伊朗互联网大面积瘫痪属史上最严重之一
item.description: 自定义屏蔽工具已取代暴力关闭措施。【原文：Custom blocking tools have replaced brute-force shutdowns.】

item.title: 债券市场平静会否引发私募市场的明斯基时刻？
item.description: 风险承担行为正受到数十年来最平静的市场环境的助推，这引发了人们对投资者是否为下一次信贷紧缩做好准备的质疑。【原文：Risk-taking is aided by the calmest markets in decades, raising questions about how prepared investors are for the next credit crunch.】

item.title: 蓝色起源推出卫星服务以满足数据中心需求
item.description: 杰夫·贝索斯支持的蓝色起源公司周三表示，正致力于构建卫星通信网络，为数据中心、政府及企业提供连接服务。【原文：Jeff Bezos-backed Blue Origin is building a satellite communication network to deliver connectivity to data centers, governments and businesses, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 能源股有望创纪录，因格陵兰及北极寒流影响
item.description: 过去几个月能源股的强劲反弹，正推动该板块步入创下新高之路。随着地缘政治不确定性加剧，投资者纷纷押注油价将维持高位。【原文：A sizzling rally in energy stocks over the past few months has the group on pace to reach a new high as rising geopolitical uncertainty pushes investors to bet on elevated oil prices.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔以贩毒为由对哥伦比亚商品征收30%关税
item.description: 总统丹尼尔·诺沃亚对厄瓜多尔北部邻国哥伦比亚的进口商品征收30%惩罚性关税，以此迫使哥伦比亚政府在边境管控问题上作出"切实承诺"。【原文：President Daniel Noboa slapped a 30% punitive duty on imports from Ecuador’s northern neighbor, Colombia, to push its government toward a “real commitment” on border control.】

item.title: 尼日利亚央行官员对11月维持利率不变的决定意见分歧
item.description: 尼日利亚央行官员在11月会议上对是否降息存在分歧，最终由行长奥拉耶米·卡多索投下决定性一票，维持利率不变。【原文：Nigerian central bankers were split on whether to cut interest rates or keep them unchanged when they met in November, with Governor Olayemi Cardoso casting the tie-break vote to stay on hold.】

item.title: 若欧洲基金继续持有股票，抛售国债似乎具有象征意义
item.description: 欧洲养老基金抛售美国国债的行为，只要它们继续持有规模更大的美国公司债和股票，全球投资者基本不予理会。【原文：Sales of US Treasury holdings by European pension funds have largely been shrugged off by global investors, so long as they keep their much larger stockpiles of US corporate debt and equities.】

item.title: 黎巴嫩总理称国际货币基金组织要求修改新银行存款法
item.description: 黎巴嫩总理纳瓦夫·萨拉姆表示，国际货币基金组织已要求黎巴嫩修改一项拟议法律，允许储户取回被困在银行体系中的资金。【原文：Lebanon has been asked by the International Monetary Fund to amend a proposed law to allow depositors to recover funds trapped in the banking system, Prime Minister Nawaf Salam said.】

item.title: 荷兰首相敦促通过外交努力化解美国关税威胁
item.description: 荷兰首相迪克·舒夫呼吁通过外交途径解决争端，该争端源于美国总统唐纳德·特朗普威胁称，若无法获得格陵兰岛控制权，将对多个欧洲国家加征关税。【原文：Dutch Prime Minister Dick Schoof advocated for finding a diplomatic solution to resolve a dispute over additional tariffs that US president Donald Trump threatened to impose on several European countries if he can’t take over control of Greenland.】

item.title: 特朗普在达沃斯演讲中坚持要求获得格陵兰岛
item.description: 美国总统希望就获取北极领土问题进行"立即"谈判。【原文：The US president wants “immediate” talks on acquiring the Arctic territory.】

item.title: 肯·格里芬称日本债券抛售是给美国的"明确警告"
item.description: 城堡基金的肯·格里芬表示，本周日本国债遭遇的抛售潮应成为对美国政界人士的"明确警告"，敦促其改善国家财政状况。【原文：Citadel’s Ken Griffin said heavy selling of Japanese government bonds this week should serve as an “explicit warning” to US politicians to improve the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 亿万富豪孙大雄的生物科技股暴涨令做空者血本无归
item.description: 生物科技亿万富翁帕特里克·孙尚雄旗下的ImmunityBio公司股价在过去三周内飙升逾三倍，迫使部分做空该股的投资者被迫止损离场。【原文：Biotech billionaire Patrick Soon-Shiong’s ImmunityBio Inc. has more than tripled over the past three weeks, forcing some short sellers that were betting against the stock to exit their positions at a loss.】

item.title: 高盛、蓝猫眼为OneStream交易筹措30亿美元私募贷款
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募股权公司Hg正与私募信贷机构洽谈一笔约30亿美元的贷款，用于资助其收购OneStream公司的交易。【原文：Buyout firm Hg is in discussions with private credit lenders for a roughly $3 billion loan to help finance its acquisition of OneStream Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国20年期国债拍卖在格陵兰岛紧张局势中测试市场需求
item.description: 长期国债在20年期国债拍卖前收复失地，此次拍卖将揭示投资者对美国在控制格陵兰问题上的强硬态度以及全球严峻财政状况的看法。【原文：Long-maturity Treasuries recouped losses ahead of an auction of 20-year bonds that stands to illuminate investor attitudes about US aggression over control of Greenland and challenging fiscal conditions globally.】

item.title: 男装仓库公司发行垃圾债券，收益率达10%，用于支付分红
item.description: 男装仓库公司已开始发行4亿美元垃圾债券，提供今年最高收益率之一。这家服装零售商正寻求资金支付股东分红，此前该公司经历了有史以来最繁忙的债务融资分红期之一。【原文：Men’s Wearhouse has begun marketing a $400 million junk bond, offering one of the highest yields of the year, as the clothing retailer seeks funds to pay owners following one of the busiest periods ever for debt-funded dividends.】

item.title: OpenAI首席财务官为ChatGPT广告辩护，称其为"强劲商业模式"
item.description: OpenAI的一位高管为公司在热门聊天机器人ChatGPT中添加广告的行为辩护，称此举旨在让更多人能够接触人工智能。【原文：One of OpenAI’s top executives defended the company’s addition of ads to its popular chatbot ChatGPT as a way to democratize access to artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 赞比亚在面临10亿美元债务墙之际取消外债上限
item.description: 赞比亚将外国投资者可购买本币债券的限额提高了四倍以上，此举可能降低债务展期风险，因今年约有11.6亿美元债务到期需偿还。【原文：Zambia has more than quadrupled the cap on local-currency bonds that foreign investors can buy, a move that may reduce rollover risk as about $1.16 billion in debt payments fall due this year.】

item.title: 热狗制造商纳森将被猪肉生产商史密斯菲尔德收购
item.description: 史密斯菲尔德食品公司宣布将以约4.5亿美元收购传奇热狗品牌纳森名店，从而获得其最大业务板块中关键产品的经营权。【原文：Smithfield Foods Inc. said it would acquire legendary hot dog brand Nathan’s Famous in a deal valued at about $450 million, securing the rights to a key product in its business’s largest segment.】
